title: Vitamin C Eye Gel by Vellumay tm - Serum Contains Vitamin E And Hyaluronic Acid For Tissue Hydration And Rejuvenation - Eye Cream Formulated with Anti-Aging Moisturizers and Skin Brightening Ingredients such as licorice Root - Best Anti Wrinkle Cream to Combat Puffiness - Great For Sagging Skin and Dark Under Eye Circles - Smoothes Wrinkles and Crow's Feet
description: What You Need To Know About Concentrated Eye SerumsWhy This Serum Is Unique- This concentrated eye gel contains the perfect balance of 3 key ingredients-vitamins C, E and hyaluronic acid.- This serum also has Licorice root, Cucumber and green tea extract for additional skin enhancement.- This product is oil free, paraben free and no animal testing was performed in the formulation.- It is specifically formulated to not only reduce the appearance of wrinkles, but to also brighten and enhance the skin.- Used as part of a daily regimen, you will see results and at a price far below the department store brands and hype.Things You Need To KnowHyaluronic Acid is vital to our skin. We begin to lose this naturally occurring ingredient as we age. Hyaluronic Acid absorbs up to 1,000 times its weight in water providing needed moisture to aging or damaged skin. Vitamin C supports the skins cells and structure from UV damage, strengthens the skins barrier and reduces inflammation. Cucumber is widely known to reduce inflammation, puffiness and dark circles. Licorice root is widely accepted as a perfect skin enhancer for overexposed, sun damaged skin. And Green Tea extract has a strong antioxidant effect known for reducing free radicals and improving the health of the skin and reducing the appearance of wrinkles.Adding Vellumay Vitamin C Eye Gel Makes A Difference In Your Skins Appearance- Rehydrates the skin and replenishes needed nutrients.- Contains the perfect combination of ingredients for a regular facial regimen.- Perfect for eliminating the effects of free radicals and oxidizing the skin.- Made in the USA in a FDA certified lab using good manufacturing practices(cGMPs)If not completely satisfied, return for a full refundClick the buy tab NOW to get Vellumay Vitamin C Eye Gel!
